snippet: The court will hear cases on the free speech rights of private groups receiving federal money and the right against self-incrimination during police questioning.
abstract: Supreme Court agrees to decide cases on free speech rights of private groups receiving federal money and the right against self-incrimination during police questioning
lead_paragraph: The court will hear cases on the free speech rights of private groups receiving federal money and the right against self-incrimination during police questioning.

headline.seo: Supreme Court Takes Up First and Fifth Amendment Cases
headline.main: Justices to Hear Case on Groups’ Free Speech
headline.print_headline: Justices to Hear Case On Groups’ Free Speech
